card.name: Auriok Glaivemaster
card.property: As long as Auriok Glaivemaster is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me a bit of steel and I'll deliver it into the hearts of my enemies."

card.name: Echoing Calm
card.property: Destroy target enchantment and all other enchantments with the same name as that enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single light unleashes a hail of cleansing.

card.name: Emissary of Hope
card.property: Flying Whenever Emissary of Hope deals combat damage to a player, you gain 1 life for each artifact that player controls.

card.name: Hallow
card.property: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bend with the storm, then reply in kind."

card.name: Leonin Battlemage
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Leonin Battlemage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strongest of the pride are measured not by the steel in their hands but by the steel in their souls.

card.name: Leonin Shikari
card.property: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.

card.name: Loxodon Mystic
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the nim storm across the plains, a lone priest stands in their path. At his silent gesture, the battle line breaks, and the tide turns.

card.name: Metal Fatigue
card.property: Tap all artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok have fought the metal hordes for so long now that knowing how to cripple them has become an instinct.

card.name: Pristine Angel
card.property: Flying As long as Pristine Angel is untapped, it has protection from artifacts and from all colors. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Pristine Angel.

card.name: Pteron Ghost
card.property: Flying Sacrifice Pteron Ghost: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Defending to the death isn't always enough.

card.name: Pulse of the Fields
card.property: You gain 4 life. Then if an opponent has more life than you, return Pulse of the Fields to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before religion or civilization, there was order.

card.name: Purge
card.property: Destroy target artifact creature or black creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first and last time, the horrific creature experienced terror.

card.name: Ritual of Restoration
card.property: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonin raising ceremonies take place at the white sun's dawn, the rebirth of artifacts mirroring the birth of a new day.

card.name: Soulscour
card.property: Destroy all nonartifact permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the end of times, a future in which all our kind are torn from this world." —Ushanti, leonin shaman

card.name: Steelshaper Apprentice
card.property: {W}, {T}, Return Steelshaper Apprentice to its owner's hand: Search your library for an Equipment card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Theirs is a craft brought about by necessity, now raised to the level of art.

card.name: Stir the Pride
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. • Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life." Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Test of Faith
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who survive the test bear a mark of power anyone can recognize.

card.name: Turn the Tables
card.property: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn is dealt to target attacking creature instead.

card.name: Carry Away
card.property: Enchant Equipment When Carry Away enters the battlefield, unattach enchanted Equipment. You control enchanted Equipment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stealing goblin weapons would be easier if the goblins were smart enough to let go.

card.name: Chromescale Drake
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying When Chromescale Drake enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all artifact cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Echoing Truth
card.property: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

card.name: Hoverguard Observer
card.property: Flying Hoverguard Observer can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It could be made to run silently, but its low hum reminds the Neurok that they are always watched.

card.name: Last Word
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Someday, someone will best me. But it won't be today, and it won't be you."

card.name: Machinate
card.property: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as there are questions to be asked, the vedalken will ask them.

card.name: Magnetic Flux
card.property: Artifact creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the researcher's astonishing success, his assistants spent six hours finding a way to return the specimens safely to the ground.

card.name: Neurok Prodigy
card.property: Flying Discard an artifact card: Return Neurok Prodigy to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why should I be bound by rules when I can see so far beyond them?"

card.name: Neurok Transmuter
card.property: {U}: Target creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn. {U}: Until end of turn, target artifact creature becomes blue and isn't an artifact.

card.name: Psychic Overload
card.property: Enchant permanent When Psychic Overload enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Enchanted permanent has "Discard two artifact cards: Untap this permanent."

card.name: Pulse of the Grid
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Then if an opponent has more cards in hand than you, return Pulse of the Grid to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before labs or lectures, there was insight.

card.name: Quicksilver Behemoth
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) When Quicksilver Behemoth attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

card.name: Reshape
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Retract
card.property: Return all artifacts you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Second Sight
card.property: Choose one — • Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. • Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order. Entwine {U} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Synod Artificer
card.property: {X}, {T}: Tap X target noncreature artifacts. {X}, {T}: Untap X target noncreature artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memnarch shared a touch of his power with the vedalken in return for their service. It is a debt he intends to collect.

card.name: Vedalken Engineer
card.property: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

card.name: Vex
card.property: Counter target spell. That spell's controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The druids would be better off if they spent more time in the lab and less time watching trees grow." —Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Aether Snap
card.property: Remove all counters from all permanents and exile all tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you wake to find you were only ever a dream." —Mephidross curse

card.name: Burden of Greed
card.property: Target player loses 1 life for each tapped artifact they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The one who dies with the most toys is still dead." —Geth, keeper of the Vault

card.name: Chittering Rats
card.property: When Chittering Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bottom feeders sometimes rise to the top.

card.name: Death Cloud
card.property: Each player loses X life, discards X cards, sacrifices X creatures, then sacrifices X lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm's million wings stir the foulest of breezes.

card.name: Echoing Decay
card.property: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single fear unleashes a torrent of nightmares.

card.name: Emissary of Despair
card.property: Flying Whenever Emissary of Despair deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life for each artifact they control.

card.name: Essence Drain
card.property: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross claims all life within it. What cannot be twisted is absorbed.

card.name: Greater Harvester
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a permanent. Whenever Greater Harvester deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices two permanents.

card.name: Grimclaw Bats
card.property: Flying {B}, Pay 1 life: Grimclaw Bats gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even on a world of metal, there are those who thirst for blood.

card.name: Hunger of the Nim
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their pain is so great, they can't help but share it with others.

card.name: Mephitic Ooze
card.property: Mephitic Ooze gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Whenever Mephitic Ooze deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. The creature can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Mephidross, refuse doesn't last long—it's all scavenged, reanimated, or consumed.

card.name: Murderous Spoils
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain control of all Equipment that were attached to it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scavengers are always the first to pay their respects.

card.name: Nim Abomination
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if Nim Abomination is untapped, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is one of the oldest nim, steeped so long in the Dross that it has lost all vestiges of humanity.

card.name: Pulse of the Dross
card.property: Target player reveals three cards from their hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card. Then if that player has more cards in hand than you, return Pulse of the Dross to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before tyrants or torturers, there was evil.

card.name: Scavenging Scarab
card.property: Scavenging Scarab can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The beetles feed not on the flesh of corpses but on the metal, grinding out the iron and steel to add to their own bulky shells.

card.name: Screams from Within
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1. When enchanted creature dies, return Screams from Within from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no escaping an enemy that lives inside your head.

card.name: Scrounge
card.property: Target opponent chooses an artifact card in their graveyard. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When leonin settlers abandon their homes to the nim, items of value are often left behind.

card.name: Shriveling Rot
card.property: Choose one — • Until end of turn, whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. • Until end of turn, whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller loses life equal to its toughness. Entwine {2}{B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Barbed Lightning
card.property: Choose one — • Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature. • Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every creature on Mirrodin is a lightning rod.

card.name: Crazed Goblin
card.property: Crazed Goblin attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because fighting is easier than figuring out what else to do.

card.name: Dismantle
card.property: Destroy target artifact. If that artifact had counters on it, put that many +1/+1 counters or charge counters on an artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only the living were so easily salvaged." —Memnarch

card.name: Drooling Ogre
card.property: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, that player gains control of Drooling Ogre. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it the stomping kind or the munching kind?" —Slobad, goblin tinkerer

card.name: Echoing Ruin
card.property: Destroy target artifact and all other artifacts with the same name as that artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single misstep unleashes an avalanche of ruin.

card.name: Fireball
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

card.name: Flamebreak
card.property: Flamebreak deals 3 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Creatures dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Furnace Dragon
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying When Furnace Dragon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all artifacts.

card.name: Goblin Archaeologist
card.property: {R}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target artifact and untap Goblin Archaeologist. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Goblin Archaeologist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Always easily impressed, Durg was about to be blown away.

card.name: Inflame
card.property: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Vulshok weapon strikes with the fire of the forge that made it.

card.name: Krark-Clan Stoker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fallen enemies are fed to the scavengers. Fallen friends are thrown into the Great Furnace, their souls returned to the Great Mother.

card.name: Pulse of the Forge
card.property: Pulse of the Forge deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Then if that player or that planeswalker's controller has more life than you, return Pulse of the Forge to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before wars or weapons, there was anger.

card.name: Savage Beating
card.property: Cast this spell only during your turn and only during combat. Choose one — • Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. • Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Entwine {1}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Shunt
card.property: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You might want to work on your aim."

card.name: Slobad, Goblin Tinkerer
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Target artifact gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I used to joke that he had been exiled for being too smart. Now I know why he never laughed." —Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Tears of Rage
card.property: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step. Attacking creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Unforge
card.property: Destroy target Equipment. If that Equipment was attached to a creature, Unforge deals 2 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Compared to the fire of the forge, the strength of steel is nothing.

card.name: Vulshok War Boar
card.property: When Vulshok War Boar enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It must eat its weight in metal daily, or its furnacelike belly will consume itself for lack of fuel.

card.name: Ageless Entity
card.property: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

card.name: Echoing Courage
card.property: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

card.name: Fangren Firstborn
card.property: Whenever Fangren Firstborn attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Tangle, bad is often followed by worse.

card.name: Infested Roothold
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from artifacts Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, you may create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

card.name: Karstoderm
card.property: Karstoderm enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, remove a +1/+1 counter from Karstoderm.

card.name: Nourish
card.property: You gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gelfruit grows abundantly wherever Sylvok druids live, as if the Tangle knows that humans are not as hardy as the beasts or as nimble as the elves.

card.name: Oxidize
card.property: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ashes to ashes, rust to rust." —Viridian shaman

card.name: Pulse of the Tangle
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Then if an opponent controls more creatures than you, return Pulse of the Tangle to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before predators or prey, there was life.

card.name: Reap and Sow
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target land. • Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Entwine {1}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Rebuking Ceremony
card.property: Put two target artifacts on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the Radix at the hub of the Tangle all the way out to the Edges of Forgetting, a Viridian elf's life is built around the temporary.

card.name: Roaring Slagwurm
card.property: Whenever Roaring Slagwurm attacks, tap all artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wurms compete for nesting grounds near the Radix. The young who hatch closest have the best chance for survival.

card.name: Stand Together
card.property: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and two +1/+1 counters on another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Strange times make for strange allies.

card.name: Tangle Spider
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're considered good luck by the elves they don't eat.

card.name: Tanglewalker
card.property: Each creature you control can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In bringing life to Mirrodin, Memnarch was more successful than he knew—for Mirrodin began to take on a life of its own.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Outrider
card.property: Protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the levelers come again, we shall be ready for them."

card.name: Tel-Jilad Wolf
card.property: Whenever Tel-Jilad Wolf becomes blocked by an artifact creature, Tel-Jilad Wolf gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thanks to the wolves, Tel-Jilad is the one area of Mirrodin the myr don't see often.

card.name: Viridian Acolyte
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have no sun to guide our dead, so I tend the prismatic flames of the spirit fires that show the souls their way. When I die, I hope there is one left to guide my spirit home."

card.name: Viridian Zealot
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Viridian Zealot: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will fight only the way nature intended—and nature intended us to win."

card.name: Aether Vial
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.

card.name: Arcane Spyglass
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card and put a charge counter on Arcane Spyglass. Remove three charge counters from Arcane Spyglass: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It breaches not physical distances but temporal ones.

card.name: Arcbound Bruiser
card.property: Modular 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Crusher
card.property: Trample Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Crusher. Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Fiend
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move a +1/+1 counter from target creature onto Arcbound Fiend. Modular 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Hybrid
card.property: Haste Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Lancer
card.property: First strike Modular 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Overseer
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature with modular you control. Modular 6 (This creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Ravager
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Ravager. Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Reclaimer
card.property: Remove a +1/+1 counter from Arcbound Reclaimer: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library. Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Slith
card.property: Whenever Arcbound Slith deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Stinger
card.property: Flying Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

card.name: Arcbound Worker
card.property: Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The parts are as strong as the whole.

card.name: Auriok Siege Sled
card.property: {1}: Target artifact creature blocks Auriok Siege Sled this turn if able. {1}: Target artifact creature can't block Auriok Siege Sled this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything in its path is either pushed aside or ground under.

card.name: Chimeric Egg
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a nonartifact spell, put a charge counter on Chimeric Egg. Remove three charge counters from Chimeric Egg: Chimeric Egg becomes a 6/6 Construct artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

card.name: Coretapper
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on target artifact. Sacrifice Coretapper: Put two charge counters on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It converts the faintest surges of power from Mirrodin's core into usable energy, providing endless power for Memnarch's creations on the surface.

card.name: Darksteel Brute
card.property: Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {3}: Darksteel Brute becomes a 2/2 Beast artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Darksteel Colossus
card.property: Trample, indestructible If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Darksteel Forge
card.property: Artifacts you control have indestructible. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them. Artifact creatures with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did it have this shape upon Mirrodin's creation, or did some inconceivable force shape the unshapable?" —Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Darksteel Gargoyle
card.property: Flying Indestructible (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ultimate treasure is one that guards itself.

card.name: Darksteel Ingot
card.property: Indestructible {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Darksteel Pendant
card.property: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) {1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Darksteel Reactor
card.property: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Darksteel Reactor. When Darksteel Reactor has twenty or more charge counters on it, you win the game.

card.name: Death-Mask Duplicant
card.property: Imprint — {1}: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. As long as a card exiled with Death-Mask Duplicant has flying, Death-Mask Duplicant has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, haste, landwalk, protection, and trample.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

card.name: Drill-Skimmer
card.property: Flying Drill-Skimmer has shroud as long as you control another artifact creature. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In close proximity, their magnetic energies merge and form a field of protection.

card.name: Dross Golem
card.property: Affinity for Swamps (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Swamp you control.) Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it skulks through the corrosive gases of Mephidross, the more it adopts their thirst for death.

card.name: Eater of Days
card.property: Flying, trample When Eater of Days enters the battlefield, you skip your next two turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Mirrodin's varied civilizations developed ways to fight the levelers, Memnarch upped the stakes.

card.name: Gemini Engine
card.property: Whenever Gemini Engine attacks, create a colorless Construct artifact creature token named Twin that's attacking. Its power is equal to Gemini Engine's power and its toughness is equal to Gemini Engine's toughness. Sacrifice the token at end of combat.

card.name: Genesis Chamber
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, if Genesis Chamber is untapped, that creature's controller creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the experimental population grows, so do the number of myr. It's a perfect equilibrium." —Memnarch

card.name: Geth's Grimoire
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The book shrieks horribly until its cover is opened, granting the spirit inside a moment's rest from the painful stirrings of the book's contents.

card.name: Heartseeker
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has "{T}, Unattach Heartseeker: Destroy target creature." Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Juggernaut
card.property: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins built it far larger than the cave opening, but to their glee, it smashed into the mountainside, ripping itself a new exit.

card.name: Kraken's Eye
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.

card.name: Leonin Bola
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Leonin Bola: Tap target creature." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Lich's Tomb
card.property: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. Whenever you lose life, sacrifice a permanent for each 1 life you lost. (Damage causes loss of life.)

card.name: Memnarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the blur between metal and flesh, Memnarch found madness.

card.name: Mycosynth Lattice
card.property: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

card.name: Myr Landshaper
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thing the myr can't do is enjoy the scenery.

card.name: Myr Matrix
card.property: Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.) Myr creatures get +1/+1. {5}: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

card.name: Myr Moonvessel
card.property: When Myr Moonvessel dies, add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Memnarch created the myr with three qualities in mind: dependability, controllability, and disposability.

card.name: Nemesis Mask
card.property: All creatures able to block equipped creature do so. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Oxidda Golem
card.property: Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.) Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

card.name: Panoptic Mirror
card.property: Imprint — {X}, {T}: You may exile an instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost X from your hand. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may copy a card exiled with Panoptic Mirror. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Razor Golem
card.property: Affinity for Plains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Plains you control.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it stands among the deadly blades of the Razor Fields, the more it adopts their harsh exterior.

card.name: Serum Powder
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Any time you could mulligan and Serum Powder is in your hand, you may exile all the cards from your hand, then draw that many cards. (You can do this in addition to taking mulligans.)

card.name: Shield of Kaldra
Skullclamp
Spawning Pit
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Spawning Pit. {1}, Remove two charge counters from Spawning Pit: Create a 2/2 colorless Spawn artifact creature token.

card.name: Specter's Shroud
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Spellbinder
Spincrusher
card.property: Whenever Spincrusher blocks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spincrusher: Spincrusher can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Spire Golem
card.property: Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.property: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Surestrike Trident
card.property: Equipped creature has first strike and "{T}, Unattach Surestrike Trident: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker." Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
Sword of Light and Shadow
Talon of Pain
card.property: Whenever a source you control other than Talon of Pain deals damage to an opponent, put a charge counter on Talon of Pain. {X}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Talon of Pain: It deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Tangle Golem
card.property: Affinity for Forests (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Forest you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The longer it weaves through the twisted vines of the Tangle, the more it adopts their hidden strength.

card.name: Thought Dissector
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact card or X cards are revealed, whichever comes first. If an artifact card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield under your control and sacrifice Thought Dissector. Put the rest of the revealed cards into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Thunderstaff
card.property: As long as Thunderstaff is untapped, if a creature would deal combat damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. {2}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trinisphere
card.property: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)

card.name: Ur-Golem's Eye
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It still stares accusingly at Memnarch, though millennia have passed since he separated the eye from its body.

card.name: Voltaic Construct
card.property: {2}: Untap target artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead may outlast the living, but those who have never lived outlast them both.

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Wand of the Elements
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice an Island: Create a 2/2 blue Elemental creature token with flying. {T}, Sacrifice a Mountain: Create a 3/3 red Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gives legs to the earth and wings to the sky.

card.name: Well of Lost Dreams
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say the knowledge lost during the Ritual of Rebuking is returned through the well's waters.

card.name: Whispersilk Cloak
card.property: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2}

card.name: Wirefly Hive
card.property: {3}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 2/2 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wirefly. If you lose the flip, destroy all permanents named Wirefly.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The lifespan of a wirefly can be precisely described as 'short.'" —Bruenna, Neurok leader

card.name: Wurm's Tooth
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.

card.name: Blinkmoth Nexus
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. {1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.property: Indestructible {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.

card.name: Mirrodin's Core
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a charge counter on Mirrodin's Core. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Mirrodin's Core: Add one mana of any color.
